content: *classic stitches whimsical details a crochet set designed for keepsake photos heartfelt gifts and everyday snuggles * an ode to timeless coziness the my lil pumpkin pie sleep set pairs classic stitches with whimsical pumpkin details featuring a ribbed knit-look texture softly rolled edges and delicate finishing touches this keepsake set includes a newborn sleep sack hat and mittens perfect for baby s earliest days or as a handmade gift to treasure originally published in 2019 this pattern has been newly refreshed in 2025 with an updated easy-to-read format and extra resources to make your crochet experience smoother than ever **when you purchase this pattern you ll receive four files ** * a full-color pdf pattern with step-by-step instructions and photos * a printer-friendly version for easy ink-saving * a us to uk/aus conversion chart * a read me first guide explaining how to use each file **pattern details ** * skill level advanced beginner * sizing newborn 0 3 months mittens fit approx 0 6 months * yarn worsted weight 4 main + accent colors * hook sizes 5 5 mm i/9 3 5 mm for embellishments * gauge 17 sts and 12 row = 4 in 10 cm in faux knit rib stitch half_double_crochet in blo/3rd loop *notes * pattern is written in *us crochet terms * buyers who purchased before 2025 still have access to the updated files this listing is for a **digital crochet pattern only** not a finished item
